question.body: Which of the following is a charcteristic of skeletal muscle?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Skeletal muscle has many nuclei and is multinucleate.
Incorrect. The alternating myosin and actin create a striped or striated appearance.
Correct. Skeletal muscle cells or fibers are long and cylinder shaped.
Incorrect. Skeletal muscle cells are voluntary, while cardiac and smooth muscle cells are involuntary.

part.hint: skeletal muscle cells are controlled by your brain and are very large compared to cardiac and smooth muscle cells.
